Package org.vast.process

Class DataConnection

java.lang.Object
org.vast.process.DataConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDataConnection
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataQueue
public class DataConnection extends Object implements IDataConnection

Implementation of data connection for the processing engine.
This class is capable of automatically converting units if source and target are not in the same unit (units have to be physically compatible)
This class is used when running all processes of a processing chain synchronously in a single thread

    • validate

      public static String validate(DataComponent src, DataComponent dest) throws ProcessException
      Checks that source and destination components can be connected. This validates compatibility of units and structure of aggregates.
      Parameters:
      src -
      dest -
      Returns:
      Warning message or null if no warning
      Throws:
      ProcessException

    • transferData

      public boolean transferData(boolean block) throws InterruptedException
      Description copied from interface: IDataConnection
      Transfer data to destination component
      Specified by:
      transferData in interface IDataConnection
      Parameters:
      block - Set to true if processing should wait until data is available on this connection, false if processing should continue without it
      Returns:
      True if data was actually transferred, false otherwise
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting
